document_data.name: Bardran Thulmaer
document_data.mainbody: Shield Duke '''Bardran Thulmaer''' was the well-loved leader of the town of [[Alamontyr]].{{Cite web/The Border Kingdoms/Alamontyr}}{{Cite polyhedron/110/Elminster's Everwinking Eye: Our Tour of the Border Kingdom Continues}}
document_data.Description: He was an aging but large man with a huge white mustache. He ruled with a conservative fair style, preferring to consult local religious leaders before making political decisions. This made him well-loved not only with the people of Alamontyr but also the people of the [[Realm of the Smoking Star]] to the west.
document_data.Background: The forty [[Griffon Knights]] were Bardran Thulmaer's personal guard and upholders of the peace in Alamontyr. Although the Shield Duke was popular with his people, he had not named a successor, leading to much speculation about who would succeed him.
